Package it.polimi.ingsw.controllers

Class ClientInputVerifier

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controllers.ClientInputVerifier
public class ClientInputVerifier extends Object
This class is used to verify the correctness of the client's input

  • Method Details

    • verifyAssistant

      public static boolean verifyAssistant(ClientGameModel clientGameModel, int selectedAssistant)
      This method verifies if the input assistant is available or if the input is correct
      Parameters:
      clientGameModel - the client game model
      selectedAssistant - the selected assistant
      Returns:
      true if the assistant is available and the input is correct false otherwise

    • verifyStudentDashboard

      public static boolean verifyStudentDashboard(ClientGameModel clientGameModel, int selectedStudent)
      This method basically verifies if the dashboard's entrance list is empty
      Parameters:
      clientGameModel -
      selectedStudent -
      Returns:
      true if the entrance list is not empty and the selected student is not a negative number false otherwise

    • verifyStudentIsland

      public static boolean verifyStudentIsland(ClientGameModel clientGameModel, int selectedStudent, int selectedIsland)

    • verifyMotherNaturePos

      public static boolean verifyMotherNaturePos(ClientGameModel clientGameModel, int selectedPos, int usedCharacter)
      This method verifies the correctness of the selected mother nature position
      Parameters:
      clientGameModel - the client game model
      selectedPos - the selected mother nature position
      usedCharacter - the used character(in case it influences mother nature's movement)
      Returns:
      false if the selected position is a negative number or if it's equals to the current mother nature position

    • verifyCloud

      public static boolean verifyCloud(ClientGameModel clientGameModel, int selectedCloud)
      This method verifies the selected cloud correctness
      Parameters:
      clientGameModel - the client game model
      selectedCloud - the chosen cloud
      Returns:
      false if the selected cloud is a negative number,is greater than the clouds list's size or the clouds list is empty

    • verifyCharacter

      public static boolean verifyCharacter(ClientGameModel clientGameModel, int selectedCharacter)
      This method verifies the correctness of a selected character
      Parameters:
      clientGameModel - the client game model
      selectedCharacter - the selected character
      Returns:
      false if the character is null,or if the number of money of the player is inferior to the character's cost

    • verifyCharacterParams

      public static boolean verifyCharacterParams(MessageCharacterParameters params, ClientGameModel clientGameModel)
      This method verifies the correctness of character parameters
      Parameters:
      params - the character parameters
      clientGameModel - the client game model
      Returns:
      false if the character's id is not a number between 1 and 12,if the entrance list is null or a student within it is null
